item.title: Reinhart, Rogoff... and R
item.description: Reinhart, Rogoff… and R EDIT: At the time I wrote this post, I didn’t know of the existence of this great one, from Christopher Gandrud, take a look! On april, the 15th, an article was published that will change economic theories… Or at least, it will questionate and change the methods employed to formule those theories. As a doctor, I spend time on reviewing evidence that can be applied to daily practice.
